text: Bellator MMA (formally Bellator Fighting Championships) is an American Mixed Martial Arts promotion based in Santa Monica, California. It is known for being one of the largest Mixed Martial Arts promotions in the world, following UFC. ==References== == Other websites == * Official Bellator MMA Site * Past to present event results and fighter records database Category:Mixed martial arts organizations Category:Mixed martial arts television programs
